name: Itâ€™s Not Right for You
content: My head
My head is full of things
That I should've done
My heart
My heart is heavy
Here it sinks like a stone
She said  is this the life
You've been dreaming of
Spinning half through the way
From the things you love
It's not too late
To do something new
She said
But not following your dreams
Makes you dead inside
If you don't love what you do
If you even have to think about it
If you really have to think about it
You got one life  to got much to do
My hands  my hands are scarred
By things I should've done
My feet  my feet are weary
From all the miles that I've run
She said
Open your mind take a look within
Are you happy with the world
That you're living in
If not  you gotta change what you do
She said
Are you happy here with me
And the things we've got
If you even have to think about it
If you really have to think about it
You got one life  to got much to do
If we don't do something now then
We'll never know
We'll never grown old
So before it's too late
And it's killing you yeah
We've only one life to live
So love what you do
If you even have to think about it
If you really have to think about it
You got one life  to got much to do
You got one life  to got much to do
You got one life  to got much to do
